page.title: 04OUR LOCAL NEWSAGENTS
page.content: Mr.Baldock is the manager of NSS,his wife helps him run the shop.He starts work at 6.00am and works until 6.00- 7.30pm.The shop opens at 7.30am.It closes at 6.00pm on Tuesday, and Friday,5.30pm on Saturday and 12.noon on Sunday.Mr.Baldock works 12 hours a day and he just has 1hour dinner break.He started to work for NSS in 1968.He worked in Coventry then Luton then Coventry again and now Derby.13 people work(3 full-time,10 part-time) at NSS and there are 5 tills.The shop opened in 1980 and sells stationery, toys,and records too.Mr.Baldock has Saturday afternoon from 1.00pm.There are 12 Sunday paper rounds aswell as 7 morning and 11 evening.Mr.Baldock has a very busy day it includes opening the shop in the morning,pricing and filling up,taking deliveries and doing paper-work.BY Angela and Julie.
